properties.areaDesc: Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 2:08PM EST until March 3 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...SW winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4
to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...Fire Island Inlet to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From noon Monday to 6 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous seas may linger into daytime
Tuesday.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM EST TUESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
